body_html: Hi @Russell91. This request sounds quite reasonable to me. If you send in a pull request that enables this, I would happily accept it. I think the best thing to do would be to have gfile.Walk https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/platform/default/_gfile.py#L400 follow symlinks by default (we can just pass follow_links=True to the os.walk call)
body_text: Hi @Russell91. This request sounds quite reasonable to me. If you send in a pull request that enables this, I would happily accept it. I think the best thing to do would be to have gfile.Walk https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/platform/default/_gfile.py#L400 follow symlinks by default (we can just pass follow_links=True to the os.walk call)
body: Hi @Russell91. This request sounds quite reasonable to me. If you send in a pull request that enables this, I would happily accept it. I think the best thing to do would be to have gfile.Walk https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/platform/default/_gfile.py#L400 follow symlinks by default (we can just pass follow_links=True to the os.walk call)
